snippet.title: Super Mario Eclipse Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
It's finally here!! The first public demo of Super Mario Eclipse is now available to download!

Download link: https://gamebanana.com/mods/320022

Super Mario Eclipse is part beta restoration, part enhancement, part original mod, and all fan service. With dozens upon dozens of new missions, fully custom worlds, challenging secret courses, and an interconnected Isle Delfino to boot, this is the Super Mario Sunshine experience you always wanted- and then some! Isle Delfino is hiding all new secrets just waiting to be uncovered, and with multiple playable characters by your side, there's nothing you can't do. Presenting an all-new expanded story, crazy new gimmicks, exciting new moves and abilities, and references to your favorite Gamecube era Mario Games, get ready for the collaborative efforts of the entire Sunshine modding community to finally come together and bring you something special! This Super Mario Sunshine mod is sure to Eclipse the rest!

Eclipse Discord server: https://discord.gg/ts9bmqJ

YouTube channel Discord server: https://discord.gg/T6Y8K4n

Music used in the second half of the trailer is the stage theme for Erto Rock, composed by our very own Fracture Music! Give him some love :D

Mario voice provided by the wonderful Joseph367!! Let him know how great he did!

Badass title graphic created by Some-Crappy-Edits! Tell him how Uncrappy his work really is! :3

Special thanks goes to:

Rhythm/Tempo: This very channel lmao
JoshuaMK: https://www.youtube.com/c/JoshuaMK
Spider: @Spider# 0002 (Discord)
Epicwade: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ_ctoBui6rJLm0aYdNNMcg
Inkstar: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2-j-I0mbOHOi_PTeYPffTA
GoogleCheese: https://youtube.com/channel/UC7Ts0JQN-dtrpld_Ih82xZA
Henk_wasmachine: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvc50VrEni3uDj_PleugZvg
Justcamtro: https://twitter.com/justcamtro?s=09
Sunn: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9NEWB7awA-Qbh--LHb0_Jg
Yoshi2: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCez-Er2DsRiBrUuW8zsE_Cw
Augs: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMOv0kHuOC0JE2G0ebhGsnA
Froggo: https://twitter.com/frickofrog
Halleester: https://twitter.com/The_Halleester
Purple Twirler: https://www.youtube.com/c/PurpleTwirler
UncleNate: https://linktr.ee/UncleMeat
ViperSnek: @ViperSnek# 5281 (Discord)
Avenger of Blood: @Avenger of Blood# 1307 (Discord)
Fracture Music: https://youtube.com/channel/UCmA8kSC1d4OL4wm56Vhz4Ng
Itsdrewmusic: @itsdrewmusic# 2954 (discord)
Cyrus: https://youtube.com/channel/UCRCK8XMnntEdFk76OiLgywQ
Fullmoon: (Anonymous)
Xainward Shrimpus: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXJnKLviIZ-xRNS2PnYzlyw
GamerSubzero: "hi I help make models for mod"
Just_Gio123: @Just_Gio123# 7980 (discord)
Eren Baris Kaplan: https://www.instagram.com/invites/contact/?i=1a1rw0ek2gddw&utm_content=1vxat3f
Some-Crappy-Edits: https://www.behance.net/some-crappy-edits
Joseph367: @Joseph 367# 9799 (Discord)
XRay: (Anonymous)
The Twin Symphonies System: https://discord.gg/GSpz8yy2
Fusiondragoon "Multi": (Anonymous)
Pure Mops: (Anonymous)
Demonslayer69: (Anonymous)
PF2M: https://pf2m.com/
Mondo Brandon: "Thank you so much for the Sunshine love!"
Brace: (anonymous)
Ian_LC: (anonymous)
Nebuladiv:  https://www.speedrun.com/sms
Rory Cork (404): https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198268610925/
Keystone Light: https://twitter.com/connoranastasio

Including some special friends who kept me going when I thought I couldn't:

Inkstar's good buds: https://discord.gg/5WD9dqbHA8
Beagle: https://twitch.tv/Beagle_36
Shay: https://twitter.com/Luminous_Wish?s=09
Luka: (Anonymous)
Lucrayzor: @Lucrayzor# 8288 (Discord)
Kirbinator: https://twitter.com/Boyo_418?s=09
xPearlheartx: https://twitter.com/xPearlheartx?s=09
SharkGuy: https://twitter.com/SharkGuy8?s=09
SaudosistaBlue: https://twitter.com/Saud0sista?s=09

As well as individuals no longer with us:

Thomas: who helped recreate Spaceworld assets before leaving one day
(Unnamed): who created Yoshi Village before departing from the community
Masterf0X: a pioneer of many code related assets who mysteriously vanished

And a very special mention to Sir Pri General Major Boobygrin: A passionate fan who passed away excitedly following the mod. I've never forgotten you ;w;
